name: Reverse Plank
target_muscles: Abs, Obliques, Lower Back, Glutes, Hamstrings
instruction: Sit down with your hands slight behind your back and shoulder width apart. Use your hands and push your body upwards until your body is in a straight line. Hold reverse plank position for desired amount of time.
hints: Keep your hands under your shoulders, your arms and legs extended, and maintain your head neutral. Roll your shoulders back, open your chest and breathe deeply and as naturally as possible.
